titleStmt.title: Hodos tethlimmēnē. = The narrow way to glory. Delivered in a sermon, by the Archdeacon of Shrewsbury
titleStmt.author: Jeffray, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: By T. Cotes for Richard Hawkins, and are to be sold at his shop in Chancery Lane, neare the Rowles,

notesStmt.note: The Archdeacon of Shrewsbury = William Jeffray.
The first two words of the title in Greek characters.
Running title reads: The narrow way to glory.
Entered in the Stationers' Register December 6, 1633.
Pp. 15-16 stained, print missing. Some print show-through.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Chancery Lane, neare the Rowles
